overview: Infiltrate•Destroy•Rebuild: The Video Album bonus disc! From the late 90's into the new millennium the 'mainstream' attempted to destroy Rock & Roll. Now, Rock & Roll Infiltrates, Destroys & Rebuilds the 'mainstream' I.D.R. The video album is a full-length collection of 12 music videos plus a whole lot more from CKY, the entity that started the destruction of mainstream Rock & Roll during the era of terror...
title: CKY: Chopped & Sliced
